name: Hilton Bandung
detail: Local travelers who rarely frequent Bandung, especially those from Jakarta, would be pleasantly surprised when they stay at Hilton Bandung. Set with lower expectations of how nice 5-star hotels in Bandung would fare compared to the ones in Jakarta, these travelers would be quite awed with Hilton Bandung's modern and sophisticated design that is done flawlessly without forgoing comfort. So if you're looking for a modernly aesthetic, comfortable hotel in Bandung, Hilton Bandung can be your best bet.

name: Aryaduta Bandung
detail: I stayed in this hotel during my business trip in Bandung and had a 2 days meeting which has to be relocated in the last minutes. Surprisingly the hotel staff offered me the meeting room. They arranged everything perfectly, professionally and made my meetings went smoothly. Many thanks for all the staff who made this possible. Another thing I noticed is they are striving to make their client satisfied and this is something that I never found in other 5 stars hotels in Bandung. Definitely will stay in this hotel again, as always =)

name: Dancenter Promenade Near Cihampelas Walk
detail: Lokasi sangat strategis, ukuran kamar cukup besar.

name: THE 1O1 Bandung Dago Hotel
detail: This is one hotel in Bandung that I will return to. We got a free upgrade thanks to the staff u knew that we are on a honeymoon. They were very helpful, especially Ricky (supervisor). He helped us arrange our transport and even sit and hang with us a little to introduce the hotel and himself. Other front desk staff we helpful as well, they recommended places where locals shop and dine. The rooms are awesome and spacious enough for us and the location of the hotel is just right for travelers who wish to shop in th city.

name: Crowne Plaza Bandung By IHG
detail: It was a last minute trip. So my wife and I decided to book a trip to Bandung, as we've never been there before. Weather was perfect. Shopping nothing to shout about as most of the things offered are imitations. Great POLO RL store which offered great deals at Jalan Braga. About the hotel. I've visited Indonesia many times before for work and leisure, have stayed in many nice hotels in Indonesia. To my surprise, services and greetings by Staff at Crowne Plaza Bandung is top notch compared to all the years of my travelling. Keep it up guys! Rooms, great size. Arrived and checked into a high floor 1702. Room was perfectly layed out, but found out a bad stench coming from the toilet. Was bearable when you close the toilet door, but when you enter the toilet......the smell is just unbearable. We stayed a night, and filed a complain the following day. Was transferred to room 1210. Was upgraded to a much bigger room, minus the toilet stench. To our surprise, was given a personal card for an apology accompanied by a serving of their cakes. Classy move and great job by the team!

name: Grand Hotel Preanger
detail: I knew this hotel had a long history and reputation. But in the midst of new competitions from more modern hotels, I had thought that this hotel would probably finding it hard to maintain its service and reputation. I WAS WRONG ! The service was outstanding beyond my expectation. I expected a 4-star service from an old hotel, instead me and family received (and observed) a 5-star service standard being carried out by the staffs. The breakfast quality was also in a high standard, and for the price it was way worth it! I had a wonderful stay, room was large, my baby daughter had fun running around, there was also a swimming pool. I love the location because it's actually within walking distance of some old spots like Braga or Sunda or Naripan. It's the real Bandung atmosphere any visitors would need to have. So anytime a friend asks for a recommended hotel in Bandung, if he/she is travelling with family, my answer will always be Preanger !
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Holiday Inn Bandung Pasteur By IHG
detail: We booked a few rooms as we were going as a large family, and had a great overall experience. Rooms were nicely furnished, had everything we needed and service was exceptional. Check-in was smooth and quick, and we enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is located in an area with lots of street food and restaurants (I recommend the grilled banana at a kiosk opposite the hotel, as well as chicken porridge that's great for breakfast, also opposite the hotel), and also has a great view of Tangkuban Perahu and depending on which room you get, you may also be able to see planes landing and taking off at the nearby airport. Would recommend this to other travellers and would return if I visit Bandung again.

name: The Gaia Hotel Bandung
detail: Always feels like home staying at The Gaia Hotel Bandung.

name: The Papandayan Hotel
detail: It was really really good. As mentioned, hospitality was unmatched by any other hotel I've ever stayed in. The hotel staff went to the best of their ability to tend to our needs. We managed to have the relaxing holiday we wanted. Transport infrastructure within bandung is a huge challenge. Angkots are mostly for the locals as they are familiar with the routes, no trains or teams around, and few taxis available. We had to hire a car for the day or book a taxi, of which it took at least 20 min wait each time. However the staff made it much easier for us by helping us with these difficulties. The concierge, Agust, even ran after us as we walked towards out taxi to the airport and presented us an elephant soft toy each, thanking us for our stay and welcoming us to stay with them again. It was simply fantastic. We had a great time. Thank you Papandayan hotel!
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Aston Pasteur
detail: This is one of the best hotels in Bandung very close to most shopping malls like Paris Van Java and Pascal Mall. Very clean and tidy hotel and room was very neat and clean with super comfortable bed and pillows. This hotel deserve to be a 5 star hotel. Every staff was very welcoming and helpful in booking a taxi and explaining the places around. I would stay in this hotel again for sure.
